casebody.data:
Frederick Thomas, appellee, v. Samuel J. Damond et al., defendants, on interlocutory appeal of Bertha Lansky, formerly Bertha Freiden, appellant.Gen. No. 35,311.

Matchett, J., dissents.

Opinion filed June 24, 1931.Edelson, Latter & Wise, for appellant; William N. Wise, of counsel.Arkin, Berman & Marks, for appellee; Matthew Berman, of counsel. Mr. Justice MeSurely

delivered the opinion of the court.
